text: Arnaldo Tamayo Méndez (born January 29, 1942) is a Cuban military officer, legislator, and former cosmonaut. He was the first person of African heritage in space. As a member of the crew of Soyuz 38, he became the first Cuban citizen, the first Latin American, and the first person from a country in the Western Hemisphere other than the United States to travel into Earth orbit. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban military people Category:Astronauts
title: Arnaldo Tamayo Méndez
